items: Get started on the BOM materials for Agentic AuthZ
Schedule a kick-off with the SMEs to mobilise them on producing BOM
Get Simon to validate snowflake secrets engine and kv-based api-key
Get Andy-SE for Juniper to tailor deck for customer.
Look into transferring todoist items into here.
Connect home-server to monitor and keyboard
get ssh connectivity to the home server
get claude-code to capture hardware information
use claude-code to integrate this gtd-coach with graphiti memory
